table.name: vtiger_hruser
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hruser` ( `hruserid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name_hruser` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `solary` DECIMAL(25,8) DEFAULT NULL, `procent` TEXT DEFAULT NULL, `position` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`hruserid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_hrusercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hrusercf` ( `vtiger_hrusercf` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`vtiger_hrusercf`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
